version_description:
- 2.2.1 Compatibility

Version 1.2:
- Options Menu
- Screen Orientation Option
- Sound Bugfixes
- Play iPod and Game Music/Sound Effects at same time
- More Games Button

If you enjoyed Trace, please support us by checking out our newest game, Gomi!

We've finally released Trace 2! If you've enjoyed this game over the years, please consider supporting us and go check it out :D

New updates to Trace 1:
• Retina Display Support
• Soundtrack upgraded from 48kbps to 160kbps
• Remastered SFX

-Line Eraser
-Play Your Own Music
-Improved Person
-Improved HUD
-Bug Fixes
-Mute Button
-Improved World Select Screen
